abstract: Antonio Olmeda is sentenced to 20 years to life in prison for firing gun at two police officers on Queens sidewalk in 2011.
lead_paragraph: Antonio Olmeda, 57, pleaded guilty to two counts of first-degree attempted murder in the 2011 encounter. No one was injured.

headline.main: Man Receives 20 Years to Life for Shooting at 2 New York Officers
headline.print_headline: Man Receives 20-Year Term for Shooting at 2 Officers

snippet: Antonio Olmeda, 57, pleaded guilty to two counts of first-degree attempted murder in the 2011 encounter. No one was injured....
